JC Jieun

Introduction

Lady Collection (Korean: 레이디 컬렉션) was a South Korean R&B group under Lion Media consisting of JC Jieun, Ally and Sei. They debuted on October 8, 2009 with their self-titled mini album, and disbanded in 2010.
